description:
Provides a Sag qos policy resource. 
You need to create a QoS policy to set priorities, rate limits, and quintuple rules for different messages.

For information about Sag Qos Policy and how to use it, see [What is Qos Policy](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/140065.htm).

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.60.0+

-> **NOTE:** Only the following regions support. [`cn-shanghai`, `cn-shanghai-finance-1`, `cn-hongkong`, `ap-southeast-1`, `ap-southeast-2`, `ap-southeast-3`, `ap-southeast-5`, `ap-northeast-1`, `eu-central-1`]

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: The description of the QoS policy.

EndTime.description: The expiration time of the quintuple rule.

Name.description: The name of the QoS policy.

Priority.description: The priority of the quintuple rule. A smaller value indicates a higher priority. If the priorities of two quintuple rules are the same, the rule created earlier is applied first.Value range: 1 to 7.

QosId.description: The instance ID of the QoS policy to which the quintuple rule is created.

SourcePortRange.description: The source port range of the transport layer.

StartTime.description: The time when the quintuple rule takes effect.
